sentence.Network_en: Gods are invited to participate in the wedding and not only the goddess Eris not invited.

「遗忘女神」：不和女神厄里斯(Eris)之女Lethe。传说她的对立者是记忆女神谟涅摩绪涅(Mnemosyne)遗忘和记忆本身就是对立的。

auth_sentence.content: This definition excluded Pluto as a planet and added it as a member of the new category "dwarf planet" along with Eris and Ceres.
auth_sentence.res_content: This definition excluded Pluto as a planet and added it as a member of the new category "dwarf planet" along with Eris and Ceres.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This definition excluded Pluto as a planet and added it as a member of the new category "dwarf planet" along with Eris and Ceres.

auth_sentence.content: Because research reported last week revealed that the dwarf planet, Eris, is actually bigger than Pluto.

auth_sentence.content: That makes it the fourth dwarf planet, joining Ceres, Eris and Pluto, and the third "plutoid," or dwarf planet beyond Neptune.
